      • getData

        public static byte[] getData(java.lang.String url,
                             java.lang.String encoding)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the data pointed at by a URL as a byte array.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL
        encoding - the encoding to use for converting text content to binary content
        Returns:
        the data as a byte array
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • getDataEncoding

        public static java.lang.String getDataEncoding(java.lang.String url)
        Returns the data pointed at by a URL as a byte array.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL
        Returns:
        encoding text as a string
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs
